description: This file defines repository classes for managing master data entities such as Items and BOMs in an asynchronous SQLAlchemy context, including methods for listing, creating, and retrieving these entities.

classes.name: ItemRepository
classes.description: Repository class for managing Item entities, including listing and creating items.

classes.name: BomRepository
classes.description: Repository class for managing BOM (Bill of Materials) entities, including listing, retrieving, and listing BOM lines.

methods.name: List[Item] list_items( self, *, search: Optional[str], status: Optional[str], limit: int, offset: int )
methods.description: Asynchronously lists items with optional search and status filters, with pagination.

methods.name: Item create_item(self, payload: ItemCreate)
methods.description: Creates a new Item record in the database using provided payload.

methods.name: List[Bom] list_boms( self, *, item_id: Optional[UUID], is_active: Optional[bool], limit: int, offset: int )
methods.description: Lists BOMs filtered by item_id and activation status, with pagination.

methods.name: Optional[Bom] get_bom(self, bom_id: UUID)
methods.description: Retrieves a specific BOM by its UUID.

methods.name: List[BomLine] list_bom_lines(self, *, bom_id: UUID)
methods.description: Lists all BOMLine entries associated with a specific BOM, ordered by line number.

ctags.name: create_item
ctags.pattern: /^    async def create_item(self, payload: ItemCreate) -> Item:$/

ctags.name: get_bom
ctags.pattern: /^    async def get_bom(self, bom_id: UUID) -> Optional[Bom]:$/

ctags.name: list_bom_lines
ctags.pattern: /^    async def list_bom_lines(self, *, bom_id: UUID) -> List[BomLine]:$/

ctags.name: list_boms
ctags.signature: ( self, *, item_id: Optional[UUID], is_active: Optional[bool], limit: int, offset: int )

ctags.name: list_items
ctags.signature: ( self, *, search: Optional[str], status: Optional[str], limit: int, offset: int )
